name: Traffic Jam 2.0
description:
A fast paced roguelike shooter with randomized levels and a final boss fight. This was a submission for the Optical Optimize game jam #2. The addition of money is the scoring system. There are a couple more things I added but I'll leave those for you to find. The music can be found in the Youtube audio library. The song is "Ready-Set-Go!" by Magic in the Others. most of the sound effects are from Sound Jay, so full credit goes to them. The models were made in Magicavoxel and the game was made in blender. I have the .blend file for those who know how to use blender and i have the .app for if you don't. please don't hesitate to inform me of a bug or glitch, brag about your score, or anything else in the comments below. Thanks! 

P.S. If an error comes up when u open the .app file saying you should move it to the trash, look at the tutorial found in the comments (:
